title: National Australia Bank says to incur added $791 mln remediation charges
text:
National Australia Bank says to incur added $791 mln remediation charges

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Oct 02, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. National Australia Bank says to incur added $791 mln remediation charges Oct 2 (Reuters) - National Australia Bank Ltd said on Wednesday it will incur additional charges of A$1.18 billion ($791.43 million) after tax, relating to provisions for customer remediation. The lender said it expects the charges to reduce its cash earnings in the second half of fiscal 2019 by around A$1.12 billion after tax, and earnings from discontinued operations by about A$57 million after tax. ($1 = 1.4910 Australian dollars)

National Australia Bank says to incur added $791 mln remediation charges
